title: Duration and renewal of license
context: ยง462A-6 Duration and renewal of license. All licenses shall expire on June 30 of even-numbered years. All applicants for renewal of license shall submit a renewal application pursuant to section 436B-13 and comply with all applicable rules of the department. No applicant shall be denied a renewal of the applicant&rsquo;s license, except as provided in this chapter, as long as the applicant possesses the qualifications established by the department and remains in active service as a pilot in the State. [L 1978, c 231, pt of ยง2; am L 1985, c 126, ยง6; gen ch 1985; am L 2015, c 48, ยง2]
